name: Bouncy Wings - A Real Bird Flying Adventure!
name_original: Bouncy Wings - A Real Bird Flying Adventure!
description:
A one touch adventure! Bouncy Wings is a fun and addictive blast! It's totally free!

Little Dennis the bird is having trouble flying. He keeps running into things!

Tap to make Dennis fly!

Avoid flying into things!

Get double points!

Get stars for how far you fly!

Most importantly, beat your friends! Try to climb the leaderboards to be the best!


Suggestions? Email us at seejaykayapps@gmail.com. Be sure to rate Bouncy Wings!
